name: Parachuting Postie
description:
Parachuting Postie was made for the #7dfps 2022 and PROCJAM 2022 gamejams. It was made in approximately a week, and will generate a new cloud formation every time you play. (There's also a 'set seed' button if you want to race somebody else.)

The game is missing some key features (notibly sound and music) as well as some quality-of-life improvements. I'm hoping to make those over the next few weeks to finish this up before the end of 2022.

Thanks for playing the game, I hope you enjoy it!
